title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message:
Hey all. Got this board come in...

This one got a hole in the PCB - gone pretty deep.

First time I seen this.

My question is: should i even bother? wouldnt all the traces inside be gone/many broken lines?
What would you guys do with something like this? Donor pile?

Thanks

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message: As in a drill hole?? That sounds like a donor board to me lmao

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message: Depends on where the hole is.....picture plz.

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message:
strange. i cant upload image however i have done on the forums before without issues

yeah so it looks it exploded.

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message:
High chance 12.6V made it to the GPU, since Q8930 blew up.

However you can isolate PPVIN_S5_HS_GPU_ISNS from PPBUS_G3H at R5410 and run wires everywhere. You'll need a new home for Q8930 as wires need to run to this FET.

If you do achieve this you'll need luck the GPU wont need to be replaced.

I would pass on this,

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message: thanks for that. sounds like too much work... its going to the donor pile :D

title: 820-3330-B is there any hope for this guy?
message: Nope this is a pile of shit.
